name: Tippy Tap: Piano Tiles: Don't Tap The White Brick Original
name_original: Tippy Tap: Piano Tiles: Don't Tap The White Brick Original
description:
Don't Even Think About White Tile !
An addicting game that tests your reflexes against time and movement. Test your speed and accuracy with this simple and fun game!

Start
Tap the start button to begin and then tap on the black blocks to follow the 50 steps toward the goal.
The quicker you tap, the faster the path moves!
Tap on a white block and the game is over.

Time Attack Mode
Test your speed to see how fast can you complete 50 steps to the goal?

Long Run Mode
Measure distance advanced.
display your steps and to begin a countdown of 10 seconds.

Have a Nice Game
JS entertainment 2014.
